title: New Luxury House for Sale in Battaramulla
details:
Brand new luxury house offering extensive living space along with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. Located approx. 2 km from the Pelawatte Junction, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences and accessible via a 15-20 foot access road. The house features a spacious living & dining area, separate pantry and wet kitchen, outdoor terrace, landscaped garden & double garage.

The master bedroom sits on the 1st floor, thoughtfully designed with a walk-in closet and a spacious master bathroom. Additionally there are two more bedrooms on the 1st floor and a guest bedroom on the ground floor. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in a quiet residential neighborhood.

- Four spacious bedrooms.
- Three bathrooms equipped with hot water.
- Separate pantry and kitchen equipped with fitted cupboards & essential appliances.
- Upstairs entertainment room.
- Landscaped garden with outdoor veranda.
- Separate maids & drivers quarters.
- Electric roller garage door with two covered parking spaces.
- Furniture can be purchased with house or removed upon request.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Special discounts applicable for cash payments.
